twenty (20): How do you get to work?

tyve: Hun har været i Danmark i to år.
twenty (20): She has been in Denmark for two years.

column3: Hun har været i Danmark i to år.

tyve: Hvor længe har han været i Danmark?
twenty (20): For how long has he been in Denmark?

tyve: Hvad sprog taler Anna og Miguel sammen?
twenty (20): What language do Anna and Miguel speak together?
She gets dressed. / She puts clothes on.
